item.title: Monte Paschi 首席执行官认为继 Mediobanca 之后将有更多意大利银行交易
item.description: 意大利锡耶纳蒙蒂帕奇银行（Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA）收购竞争对手 Mediobanca SpA 可能标志着意大利银行业新一轮整合的开始。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA’s purchase of rival Mediobanca SpA could mark the start of a new wave of consolidation for Italy’s banking sector, according to the executive who pulled off the deal.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯寻求废除外国股权投资者要求
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯建议放宽现有限制，向所有外国投资者开放股票市场，因为监管机构正努力促进资金流入该地区最大的市场之一。【原文：Saudi Arabia is proposing to open its equities to all foreign investors by easing existing restrictions, as the regulators seek to boost flows into one of the region’s biggest markets.】

item.title: 特里-达菲谈芝加哥商品交易所大力发展零售交易
item.description:
在 FanDuel 上进行市场投注。【原文：

Making market bets on FanDuel.

】

item.title: 部长称全球企业将与中国在津巴布韦能源领域展开竞争
item.description: 津巴布韦能源和电力发展部长七月-莫约（July Moyo）表示，美国和其他西方国家正在考虑投资津巴布韦的能源产业，该产业长期以来由中国投资者主导。【原文：The US and other western nations are considering investing in Zimbabwe’s energy industry, long-dominated by Chinese investors, Energy and Power Development Minister July Moyo said.】

item.title: 推动英国债券交易加速受阻于法律之争
item.description: 英国计划推出一个综合磁带，将其所有债券交易数据整合到一个单一的数据流中，从而使其在全球舞台上更具竞争力。【原文：The UK’s plans to launch a consolidated tape to bring all of its bond trading data into one single stream — making it more competitive on the global stage — have been put on hold.】

item.title: BBVA 排除了增资为任何新萨瓦德尔要约提供资金的可能性
item.description: BBVA SA 主席卡洛斯-托雷斯（Carlos Torres）誓言将为可能对 Banco Sabadell SA 的第二次竞购提供资金，而不会向投资者寻求新的资金。【原文：BBVA SA Chairman Carlos Torres vowed to fund a potential second bid for Banco Sabadell SA without tapping investors for fresh funds.】

item.title: 亚洲可转换债券在 9 月份创下反弹纪录
item.description: 受投资者对人工智能投资热情的推动，亚洲可转债市场在 9 月份创下了有史以来最强劲的月度表现。【原文：Asia’s convertible bond market posted its strongest monthly performance on record in September, buoyed by investor enthusiasm for artificial intelligence plays.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长在 Tankan 会议后重申加息立场
item.description: 日本央行副行长内田伸一重申了日本央行的一贯政策，即如果经济表现符合预期，将上调基准利率。【原文：Deputy Governor Shinichi Uchida reaffirmed the Bank of Japan’s standing policy to raise benchmark interest rates if the economy performs in line with forecasts, in comments a day after a key indicator showed business sentiment remains positive.】

item.title: 瑞典关闭 87 亿美元 AP6 基金引发出售担忧
item.description: 瑞典对其养老金制度进行了重大改革，但由于政府正在推进将养老金基金的数量从六个缩减到四个，因此引发了对其价值破坏的指责。【原文：Sweden’s major overhaul of its pension system has sparked accusations of value destruction as the government plows ahead with shrinking the number of AP funds to four from six.】

item.title: 诺和诺德所有者和丹麦政府支持 3 亿欧元量子基金
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的所有者和丹麦政府成为新的主要投资者，他们表示，该基金将成为世界上最大的量子风险投资基金，以提升欧洲在技术发展中的地位。【原文：The owners of Novo Nordisk A/S and the Danish government are new anchor investors in what they say will become the world’s largest quantum venture fund, in a bid to boost Europe’s position in technological development.】

item.title: 亿万富翁的零食帝国将在俄罗斯法院下令后被查封
item.description: 据国际文传电讯社（Interfax）报道，在俄罗斯检察官声称亿万富翁丹尼斯-什滕格洛夫（Denis Shtengelov）的零食帝国向乌克兰提供支持后，莫斯科一家法院下令将其国有化。【原文：A Moscow court ordered the nationalization of billionaire Denis Shtengelov’s snack empire, after claims from Russian prosecutors that it provided support to Ukraine, Interfax reported.】

item.title: 投资者押注美联储减息，欧洲股市创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲股市延续了破纪录的涨势，因为在经济数据不乐观之后，投资者加大了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：European stocks extended a record-breaking rally as investors ramped up wagers on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts following downbeat economic data.】

item.title: 谷歌翻译的竞争对手 DeepL 探讨在美国上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国人工智能语言平台 DeepL 正在探索在美国进行首次公开募股的可能性。【原文：German artificial intelligence language platform DeepL is exploring a potential initial public offering in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴斯夫考虑推进 40 亿欧元股票回购计划
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）可能会提前开始回购至少 40 亿欧元（47 亿美元）的股票，因为这家欧洲最大的化学品生产商希望在需求不振的行业中提振股价。【原文：BASF SE may start a buyback of at least €4 billion ($4.7 billion) in shares earlier than planned, as Europe’s biggest chemicals maker looks to bolster its stock price in an industry struggling with tepid demand.】

item.title: 人工智能狂潮席卷全球，全球芯片制造商新增 2,000 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 由于投资者急于接触人工智能，全球芯片制造商的市值飙升，这是科技股狂飙突进至历史新高的最新迹象。【原文：Global chipmakers saw their market value soar as investors rushed to get exposure to artificial intelligence, the latest sign of a frenetic bull run that is pushing tech stocks to all-time highs.】

item.title: 冰岛作为大西洋中转站的地位随着航空公司倒闭而消失
item.description: 本周，冰岛仅存的一家廉价航空公司倒闭，使这个火山岛成为节俭的跨大西洋旅行者的中转站。【原文：The collapse of the last remaining Icelandic budget airline this week has put an abrupt end to the volcanic island’s pit stop for frugal transatlantic travelers.】

item.title: 台湾提出在贸易谈判期间支持企业赴美投资
item.description: 在与特朗普政府的最新一轮贸易谈判中，台湾希望取得进展，因此提出协助其科技公司在美国投资，并在美国创建产业集群。【原文：Taiwan has offered to assist its tech companies to invest in the US and create industry clusters there, as it looked to make progress during the latest round of trade talks with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 康斯伯格首席执行官表示：无人机墙应增强更广泛的空中防御能力
item.description: 挪威军火制造商康斯伯格集团（Kongsberg Gruppen ASA）的负责人表示，欧洲必须采取联合和综合的方式来防御敌方无人机，而不是针对不同的威胁建立单独的防空盾牌。【原文：Europe must pursue a joint and integrated approach in its defense from hostile drones rather than building separate air shields for different threats, the head of Norwegian arms manufacturer Kongsberg Gruppen ASA said.】

item.title: CVC Credit 在最新的直接借贷业务中融资超过 100 亿欧元
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一份声明称，CVC Capital Partners 的信贷部门已为其最新进军欧洲直接借贷市场积累了 104 亿欧元（122 亿美元）的资金。【原文：CVC Capital Partners’s credit unit has amassed a €10.4 billion ($12.2 billion) pool of capital for its latest push into European direct lending, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀意外保持疲软，这是对瑞士央行的考验
item.description: 瑞士 9 月份的通胀率出乎意料地保持在低水平，在瑞士经济也受到美国超额关税影响的情况下，这对瑞士央行构成了挑战。【原文：Swiss inflation stayed unexpectedly low in September, posing a challenge to the central bank at a time when the economy is also suffering from outsized US tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲首次公开募股银行家称市场终于出现转机
item.description: 今年秋天，大量首次公开募股重返欧洲，这表明市场正在出现转机，银行家们表示，更大规模的交易正在兴起。【原文：The return of substantial initial public offerings to Europe this autumn shows the market is turning a corner, and bankers say excitement is building for bigger deals.】

item.title: 继壳牌和辉瑞退出后，宝洁将关闭在巴基斯坦的业务
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble Co.【原文：Procter & Gamble Co. said it will discontinue its business in Pakistan, months after the company announced a global restructuring program.】

item.title: 乐购上调业绩展望，零售商在与竞争对手的竞争中占得先机
item.description: 乐购公司（Tesco Plc）上调了本财年的利润预期，因为该超市以其具有竞争力的价格和一系列商店品牌产品赢得了比预期更多的购物者。【原文：Tesco Plc raised its profit forecast for this fiscal year as the supermarket won over more shoppers than anticipated with its competitive pricing and range of store brand products.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债权人寻求新的资金和更严格的债务减免措施
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司的高级债权人已承诺向该公司注入 54 亿英镑（约合 73 亿美元）的新资金，并接受现有债务减记 25%，作为拯救这家濒临破产的公用事业公司的努力的一部分。【原文：Thames Water’s senior creditors have pledged to inject £5.4 billion ($7.3 billion) of fresh funds into the company and accept a 25% write-down on existing liabilities as part of their bid to rescue the ailing utility.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将延续涨势创下新纪录
埃及通胀降温和英镑走强为降息敞开大门
item.description: 在燃料价格可能上涨引发新一轮谨慎之前，通胀放缓和货币升值为埃及提供了今年第四次降息的空间。【原文：Slowing inflation and an appreciating currency provide Egypt with the scope to squeeze in its fourth interest-rate cut of the year before a possible hike in fuel prices spurs fresh caution.】

item.title: 黄金反弹、ZiG 紧缩刺激津巴布韦美元交易所暴涨 45
item.description: 今年以来，津巴布韦贵金属价格飙升了 48%，金矿开采商们也从中获利颇丰，津巴布韦的纯美元股票市场正在掀起一波上涨浪潮。【原文：Zimbabwe’s dollar-only stock market is riding a wave of gains, powered by gold miners cashing in on a 48% jump in the precious metal this year.】

item.title: 德梅奥准备全面改革，开云集团股价创下历史最佳季度纪录
item.description: 开云集团（Kering SA）的卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）还没来得及扭转时尚品牌古驰（Gucci）的颓势，投资者就已经用飙升的股价回报了他。如果这位新任首席执行官能成功扭转局面，Gucci 的股价还将大涨。【原文：Even before Kering SA’s Luca de Meo has had a chance to turn around stumbling fashion label Gucci, investors have rewarded him with a surging stock price. If the new CEO pulls it off, the shares could have a lot further to go.】

item.title: PAI 为 150 亿欧元冰淇淋投资项目引入新资本
item.description: 据知情人士透露，PAI Partners 正在为其与雀巢公司的冰淇淋合资企业引入新的资金，包括债务在内，该企业的估值将达到 150 亿欧元。【原文：PAI Partners is bringing in fresh capital for its ice cream venture with Nestle SA in a deal that’s set to value the business at €15 billion including debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 韩国房地产市场反弹为韩国央行降息蒙上阴影
item.description: 尽管政府采取了冷却需求的措施，但韩国房地产市场的涨势仍持续了35周，价格涨幅不断加快；这使得央行削减借贷成本以支持经济的理由变得更加复杂。【原文：South Korea’s property market extended its rally to a 35th week, with price gains accelerating despite government measures to cool demand — complicating the case for the central bank to cut borrowing costs to support the economy.】
